attributes.additional_details:
Us the English people demand the act of the Union  be dissolved.

We demand Westminster them becomes out English parliament containing only English elected parliamentarians
attributes.background: Us the English people want true independence Brexit wasn't true independence while stuck in another political union at home with Wales Scotland and N Ireland

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/617218
